entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:07 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 12:54 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.3°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.9°C
Wind: S 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023
